trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for editing binary data.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用者介面編輯二進位資料。

trans-unit.source: This editor displays hexadecimal values for binary data and allows you to edit it.
trans-unit.target: 這個編輯器會顯示的二進位資料的十六進位值，並可讓您對其進行編輯。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.BinaryEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.BinaryEditor"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the specified object using the specified service provider and context.
trans-unit.target: 編輯指定物件使用指定的服務提供者和內容的值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，可用來取得額外的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: A service provider object through which editing services may be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 可透過它編輯服務可能會取得服務提供者物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to edit the value of.
The new value of the object.
If the value of the object hasn't changed, this should return the same object it was passed.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件的值未經變更，這應該會傳回與已傳遞相同的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the editor style used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.BinaryEditor.EditValue*> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得所使用的編輯器樣式<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.BinaryEditor.EditValue*>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.BinaryEditor.EditValue*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，可用來取得額外的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_enum" name="enum" href=""></xref> value indicating the provided editing style.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_enum" name="enum" href=""> </xref>值，指出提供的編輯樣式。
